name: SCHOFIELDS FLYING CLUB LTD
about: Schofields Flying Club Ltd, established in 1969, is a renowned flight training organization based in Sydney and regional NSW. Originating as a small group of aviation enthusiasts, the club has grown into the largest aviation club on the eastern seaboard. We provide state-of-the-art aircraft, world-class facilities, and experienced instructors to empower aspiring pilots. Our mission is to educate and train skilled and responsible aviators, emphasizing a Just Safety Culture and industry best practices. We offer a range of training programs, club events, and exclusive member benefits, making flying accessible and enjoyable for our community of like-minded aviators. By joining SFC, you become part of a supportive group dedicated to the joy and advancement of flight.
